content.rendered: Renin’s heart has always been in the field of education. Having graduated from University of Portsmouth in 2012, with a MSc Biomedicine degree she was given the opportunity to teach health science to the undergraduates at University of Portsmouth. She was intrigued to explore other professions in education which can benefit students’ various ways. She has gained extensive experience in management and administration in education, and she joined Regent College in 2018. Her efforts and skills have been recognised and she has become part of a great Registry Team at Regent College. The Registry Team is responsible for all matters relating to student administration, from enrolment through to graduation, including the maintenance of student records.
